title: Friday Night In with The Morgans
overview: Friday Night In with The Morgans is video-chat-based show hosted by Jeffrey Dean Morgan and his wife Hilarie Burton Morgan from their farm in upstate New York. Each episode will have a free-flowing, raw feel featuring unfiltered conversation about how we're all getting through this unprecedented moment, as this charismatic couple connect with friends, neighbors, animals and the broader community of fans. Each week they will come together for conversations about how they are handling life in quarantine, practically helping communities, finding joy and even humor in these unprecedented times, entertaining themselves, and others, while in isolation - all done via video chat.
